installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Vanilla Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
## install packages to get version and download links
apt update && apt install -y curl wget file unzip
CLEAN_VERSION=$(echo ${TERRARIA_VERSION} | sed 's/\.//g')
echo -e "Downloading terraria server files"
cd /mnt/server
if [[ ${CLEAN_VERSION} -lt 1402 ]] ; then
wget http://terraria.org/server/terraria-server-${CLEAN_VERSION}.zip
elif [[ ${CLEAN_VERSION} -eq 1402 ]] ; then
wget https://terraria.org/system/dedicated_servers/archives/000/000/036/original/terraria-server-1402.zip?1589675482 -O terraria-server-1402.zip
else
echo -e "Detected version ${CLEAN_VERSION} which is not yet supported."
fi
echo -e "Unpacking server files"
unzip terraria-server-$(echo ${CLEAN_VERSION} | sed 's/\.//g').zip*
cp -R ${CLEAN_VERSION}/Linux/* ./
chmod +x TerrariaServer.bin.x86_64
echo -e "Cleaning up extra files."
rm -rf ${CLEAN_VERSION}
echo -e "Generating config file"
cat <<EOF > serverconfig.txt
worldpath=/home/container/saves/Worlds
worldname=default
world=/home/container/saves/Worlds/default.wld
difficulty=3
autocreate=1
port=7777
maxplayers=8
EOF
mkdir -p /mnt/server/saves/Worlds
echo -e "Install complete"
